site_key: ✅ chrts00000000031 for test, chrts00000000032 for prod.
session_start_timestamp: ✅ String, converted from a number. Timestamp in milliseconds.
sent_timestamp: ✅ String, converted from a number. Timestamp in milliseconds.
collect_timestamp: ⚪️ Not implemented. Peach server side. number
user_id: ⚪️ Not implemented. Only for logged user.

client.id: ✅ Globaly unique id. Tag Commander unique id.
client.name: ✅ Pretty app name.

events.id: ✅ Media URN. Subdivision URN if selected by the user. Otherwise, played stream URN.
events.event_timestamp: ✅ String, converted from a number. Timestamp in milliseconds.

props.playback_position_s: ✅ String, converted from a number. In seconds. OnDemand: position, Livestream: time consumed.
props.playback_timeshift_s: ✅ String, converted from a number. In seconds. OnDemand: empty, Livestream: 0 if live, distance to the live if timesift > 30 seconds.

metadata.duration: ✅ String, converted from a number. In seconds. Duration of the media URN, not the episode.
metadata.title: ⚪️ Not implemented.
